storyInfo: Ægir broadcasts their declaration across the entire continent of Terra. Ulpianus intercepts the Seaborn, the formal researcher of the prehistoric civilization. To discover the truth, and to save Ægir, they perhaps will truly walk together.

attributes.content: Do you really mean to return?
attributes.name: Gentle Male Voice

attributes.content: I've finally found out that man's whereabouts.
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: No matter who he is or what vulpohole he's decided to hide himself in, he hurt our daughter. He needs to pay.
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: Then let me come with you. I don't care if it's famiglie standing in our way, cruel Catastrophes, endless tides, or fire raining from the skies, we'll face them together.
attributes.name: Gentle Male Voice

attributes.content: Would the shrine be alright without you?
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: Relax, it's just killing a few people. It long past time for those bastards to head to hell.
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: Then it seems we must part once more...
attributes.name: Gentle Male Voice

attributes.content: Heavens drink their fill, sky besot by sakura, drunken clouds stumble.
attributes.name: Gentle Male Voice

attributes.content: Was that a haiku? It's got a good rhythm, perfectly suited for reciting while swinging a sword.
attributes.name: Calm Female Voice

attributes.content: (Blows nose)
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: The hell, man, why're you crying?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: An assassin gets revenge for her daughter by crossing two big famiglie, so she's forced to flee to a distant country.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: And many years later, she has to leave behind her gentle husband and re-enter the storm, all for her daughter's sake again.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: When I think about the people in real life who live like that, I can't help it... The way I see it, the movie should be from her point of view!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: I hope I don't gotta remind you that this film's supposed to be our famiglia's business card in the new city. And we're supposed to be reviewing it together.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: We gotta control how this city looks at our boss and our business.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: I thought you said it was great last time?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Great? Then why'd that killer lady show up outta nowhere?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: 'Cruel Catastrophes'? 'Endless tides'? 'Fire raining from the skies'? Who wrote this crap?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Sure, the Columbians poked a hole in the sky, but I ain't never heard of no fire raining down. When's this supposed to take place, anyway?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: When're you gonna learn to have a bit of perspective?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: A cold-blooded killer putting down her blade for a peaceful tomorrow in Nuova Volsinii, all thanks to our famiglia's influence. You can't get more with the times than that!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Eh, if you put it that way, the film's even more crap. But you're right, as long as it's to the Signora's liking—
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Hey, which bastard touched the switch? We under attack?!
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: No, look at the screen!
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Mr. Tin Man?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: We have a press conference starting soon, so please keep it quick.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: While you all were busy flinging all those things into the sky, I made a few rounds in Kazdel.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You know how I feel about this.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I do, young Banshee, I do.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: My verdict is that they feel about you much the same as you feel about them.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Considering the many vile connections they have across Terra, if they do decide to get behind your project, there will be plenty of headaches for all involved.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Thanks for the tip. Now, the press conference is about to begin—
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Don't be so hasty. Let me finish.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Nasti Lunorey, Director of Engineering at Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: You know full well that the dream you were promised can be shared with more than just the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: The Maylander Foundation will pledge their full support towards you and your Elf friend's brazen plan.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: We will decide on a date to discuss the details later. That includes future launch plans, where we hope to re-establish a more complete—
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Galleria Stellaria.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Yes, that's the one.
attributes.name: Tin Man

attributes.content: Nasti? You on the phone?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Once the conference is over, we'll need a meeting room, a coffee machine, and to clear an entire weekend off our schedule.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: That bad, huh?
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: If only it were as simple as good or bad.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: But first, the conference. Is Silence here?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I was hoping she'd stop by, but fat chance she's got the time.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: I put one of those burdenbeast blind boxes from Kjerag on her desk, and sure, she'd opened it after a week, but the little beasty was already buried under an avalanche of files in need of review!
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: The guy who's supposed to be making a speech for us isn't here yet either.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Well, he's still got two minutes—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: (Clears throat)
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Ladies and gentlemen, the press conference is about to begin. Please quiet down.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: I'll be happy to answer any and all relevant questions during the Q&A segment.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Sounds like he's in a good mood.
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: Let us first—
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Playing the same trick twice? Doesn't it get old?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: No, Ferdinand's confused too! This wasn't part of his plan! This is—
attributes.name: Muelsyse

attributes.content: ...The challenges we face are far greater than ourselves or Catastrophes. We must form a community...
...under the leadership of Ægir to overcome them together.
Repeat.
...an Ægir broadcast to all surface-dwelling peoples. We ask all of humanity to set aside your conflicts and prejudices, and join the Ægir in building a bulwark together.
The matrix has broken through the blockade and swept past the sea. Essential information and calculation results are about to make landfall.
The challenges we face are far greater than ourselves or Catastrophes. We must form a community...
...under the leadership of Ægir to overcome them together.
...'Under the leadership of Ægir.'
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
Clementia
attributes.content: You're still looking towards the land, Dr. Kal'tsit.

attributes.name: Clementia
attributes.content: Hmm... Like a mother, anxious about the child she had to leave behind.
attributes.joined: You're still looking towards the land, Dr. Kal'tsit. Hmm... Like a mother, anxious about the child she had to leave behind.

attributes.content: A child, is it?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In one brief communication, you have delivered knowledge that countless others have given their lives for to no avail. Geographical data on the Foehn Hotlands and Infy Icefield, and images from even further north of the continent.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: One way of 'showing goodwill,' I suppose?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: To share knowledge is natural, while showing goodwill takes intention. I fail to see how the two are related.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: It was essential to thoroughly evaluate the extent of shock this would be to our terrestrial friends. Were these not urgent times, we really should have been more cautious.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: My concern is that—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There are immediate dangers more worthy of our attention.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: How much longer do you believe Milliarium can hold, Consul Clementia?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: With our fleets taking shifts, we can keep up continuous, twenty-four-hour covering fire for a week.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: There have been no major changes in the Seaborn's movements. As the energy supplying the force fields dries up, the stopping power of our weapons will also gradually dwindle... but this is not outside expectations.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: The city can hold for another half a month. No more.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: How long will it take reinforcements to arrive from the home territories?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A week.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Our countless nanomachines have established steady information flows. Compressed fleets and cities can speed through them, traversing the oceans in an instant.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: However, assembling our forces will still take time.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: A week... How quick.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You need not hide your worries, Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: There are essential differences between the ways we and the landwalkers think. Simple sincerity is insufficient for reaching effective bilateral cooperation.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: On the one hand, we hope that reinforcements will arrive as soon as possible. On the other, you worry that the subsequent contact and communications will be outside your control.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You even worry that Skadi and the Doctor have deviated from your plans.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You already know of Skadi's secret, then.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: My Little Handy happened to record a chance meeting between Skadi, the Doctor, and Mártus on a street corner.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Compared to discovering the secrets of their identities, controlling who knows what is much more difficult.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: An Abyssal Hunter with a Firstborn within her, and a Predecessor scientist who witnessed the rise and fall of the prehistoric civilization in person. They are both of great import to Ægir.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Based on simple evolutionary logic, the Firstborn would not have chosen to entrust the future of its kin to its killer.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: We still have no idea how the Seaborn will become the final answer to resisting ruination.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Even with missing memories, the Doctor still bears that mission. How will this so-called 'death of all things' come about, and what can Terra do about it? We must find out.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Skadi and the Doctor are, without a doubt, the key to Ægir's solving of the riddles.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Skadi will face her blood. The Doctor's duty will be fulfilled. But it should be their choice, not somebody else's scheme.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I fear that once Ægir learns of their identities, it will devise ways to exploit them.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Horatia asked me earlier if I was hiding something from her.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: And how did you answer, Madame Consul?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: No need to worry. She does not know, yet.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: You truly treasure Skadi and the Doctor, don't you? Even when confronted with a disaster threatening to wipe out civilization, you still wish to respect their choices.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: But this is no time for us to hesitate. I can't hide this from Horatia forever.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: I presume you have a plan then, considering you're hiding this from her at all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I've reached an agreement with Gladiia. We will take over all Abyssal Hunter-related research in the name of the Legions, and ensure that the Hunters will not be put in circumstances depriving them of a choice.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: As for the Doctor and myself... We hope to go deeper into the Ægir home territories, and solve these mysteries by ourselves.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I fear that we will need an Ægir guide.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well then... it would be my pleasure.
attributes.name: Clementia

attributes.content: Cassia will receive the punishment she deserves. Milliarium's incubation chamber has been moved to safety, so as long as the city doesn't fall, the child she left behind will be born safely.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: They will be raised in the Institute of Incubation.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I know what you're thinking. The fate of a Church of the Deep cultist isn't worth calling you over for.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Do you still think that everything will end in ruin, Mr. Avitus?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: I still believe in history. Once written, it can never be changed.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Even a tragic victory is destined to be another page in its annals.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I'm glad to hear you say that.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Let's get down to business, Jordi. I met with Consul Clementia.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I confessed everything. What I was thinking, what I did, what I saw but never spoke of.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I accepted the tribunal's interrogation, but they did not believe I deserved to be labeled fallen. I had stood at the precipice and looked around. Perhaps even stuck a toe over the edge, but no more than that.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Their final verdict was that I could keep my post and continue to stay in Milliarium.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: It sounds like you have other plans, though?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: They may see it as repentance, but I cannot forget the outcome of my silence and inaction.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I'm not arrogant enough to believe I could have affected an entire military campaign on my own, but... what if I had reported Cassia's unusual behavior?
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: This could have played out very differently.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: And so, I plan to leave Milliarium.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: To where? The Ægirian home territories?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Somewhere even further than that.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Even further?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Now that the Waterway has opened, Ægir is about to restart the work interrupted by the Seaborn.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Expeditionary fleets will once more explore the far side of Terra, but this time, we have changed the course of our voyage.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: We might set off from that mining nation of Rim Billiton, and try to touch the edge of the sea.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Better I die on some expedition into the unknown than wallow here in sorrow, self-reproach, and despair until it saps me of all my strength.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: There, whether we go forwards or downwards, no one knows what awaits us. We will be like Breogan in times of yore, pushing back against the darkness of ignorance.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: Y-You mean...?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You caught on, Jordi Fontanarossa. Yes, I'm inviting you to join us on this distant voyage.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I'm not the only one who desires this.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: You said earlier that I never answered your questions properly. You were right, and I should apologize. But there was something I truly wished to tell you back then.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: We have no need to prove our place. Even if the vestiges of the past have worn you down to nothing, you can still tie your future to Ægir.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: I don't know what to say, this is all a bit much...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Don't worry. Ægir respects the choices of all its citizens.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: We farewell on your carefully-considered departure. We await your eventual return, no matter how long it may take.
attributes.name: Avitus

attributes.content: ...Maestro.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Today's maintenance work on the lighthouse should be finished. Is there some sort of issue with the others?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: No, I'm just here to watch the sea, like you.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I heard from the other Inquisitors that you kept making time to come to the coast, even while we were in Milliarium?
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Iberia threw a stone into the sea. We were worried it would foment an unstoppable wave, but what was even more worrying was that it might sink in silence, with nary a whisper.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Fortunately, the stone stirred up the ripples we hoped for, and Iberia was able to see the circumstances beneath the waves... and in so doing make up its mind.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: You performed your duties as envoy admirably. If there was ever a time in your life to stand tall with your head held high, now is that time.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Y-Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Maestro, I've been thinking about returning to Gran Faro. Going back to the chapel, and where I used to live with Uncle Thiago.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: ...You should have seen Thiago one last time.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: We live in an age of regrets. If you see the Inquisition as the source of those regrets, I cannot refute you.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: If you have things to pack, Irene can help you.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: What? No, that's not what I meant. I'm really just thinking of... going back to have a look.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: In other words, you haven't yet made up your mind.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: You told me earlier that the Inquisition letting me to return to Ægir was a test. Am I not...
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: On the contrary, Jordi. Do not mistake bewilderment for momentary hesitation.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: You have lifted your lantern and clearly seen the fork in the road before you. You are merely weighing your choices before choosing which path to follow.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The sea fog is thick, and both routes seem slick with mud. But you are not the one to be criticized for this.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Jordi Fontanarossa.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: If you choose to follow that Ægirian scholar into unknown waters, the Inquisition will not stop you. The strength of the waves crashing against the shore will not change because a single clerk leaves or stays.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: If you choose to stay ashore in Iberia, you will carry responsibilities that are more exhausting than you are used to, but also much more important.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: Those are the expectations Iberia has for you.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: The choice is yours.
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: I... I understand, Maestro.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: By the by, Irene mentioned that you've been suffering from severe insomnia these past few days. How was last night?
attributes.name: Saint Carmen

attributes.content: It rained rather heavily around midnight, without a star in the sky. By the crack of dawn, there had been about two or three urgent situations I had to handle.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: But overall, a rather peaceful night, all things considered.
attributes.name: Jordi

attributes.content: Do the Seaborn dream?
Dreams are comprised of thoughts or emotions flaring up as they dissipate, but now I am nothing more than instinct.
Why... this scene... again...
Following the unfathomable passages in the ruins, at the very end, a great beast gently sticks a tentacle to the bulkhead. What is it waiting for? Perhaps...
I walk forward, passing through the shadow of the cerulean tree, until I am before Him. I extend a hand.
(Unknown language) Warning. Deep sleep procedures will commence in three minutes.
attributes.name: Electronic Announcement

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Real-time translation programs will soon shut down. Please provide all necessary instructions as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Electronic Announcement

attributes.content: (Unknown language) Ishar'mla, our shared name... our shared decision.
(Unknown language) We trust one another. We feel as one, do we not?
(Unknown language) I will watch over you, until the end of my days.
No, this person isn't me.
This isn't my dream. It's... Ishar-mla's memories?
Guh.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: You have followed me through many nests, Abyssal Hunter.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: The reinforcements from the home territories are about to arrive. The confrontation between your kin and Ægir's Legions will soon intensify. You would choose this moment to depart?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Your frontline has already advanced onto land, Seaborn. Why choose to turn back and return to the abyss?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: How is this conflict connected to the reawakening of the Firstborn?
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You are an astute man, Hunter.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: I merely discovered your existence before the others.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You left evidence in Ishar'mla's body.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You are the Church of the Deep's... founder.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: You sought refuge in the shadows to seek traces of me?
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Only a shadow may merge with a shadow.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: A most interesting Hunter.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: What do you wish to know?
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Everything.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I know you, Hunter. You are Ska-di's comrade.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Has Ægir refused your everything?
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: This nation has refused too much. So much so that it's dug its own grave.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: Your schemes are far too obvious.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: I never intended to hide them.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: I fell in order to obtain answers.
attributes.name: Ulpianus

attributes.content: (The nuclei within its skull converge)
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: I can tell you all you've longed to know, Hunter.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Regarding my next actions, regarding the sealed passages in the ruins embedded in Terra's mantle, regarding how the other Firstborns will awaken...
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Regarding Ægir, regarding the next doom to greet Terra...
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: We kin are selfless. We kin are devoted. We kin wish to share everything.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: The only requirement is that you become one with we many.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Ulpianus meets the Seaborn's 'gaze.'
It has no face, but he can tell that it is observing him. Through its transparent membranes, past the faintly leaping nuclei, Ulpianus sees his own eyes.
You said you 'fell,' earlier?
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: No, Hunter. The conjoining of flesh is not enough.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Turn endurance to acceptance. Turn humiliation to elation. You must trust the kin... Trust your own instincts.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: You must take up a duty far beyond imagination. The duty of we many.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: Perhaps you will learn the full truth in our embrace. But when the time comes, you will be unable to, unwilling to, bring it back to Ægir.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: ...Just as I could not.
attributes.name: 'Seaborn'

attributes.content: The Seaborn passes Ulpianus, swimming ever deeper into the nest. Its back quickly disappears from view, leaving only the nest before him in full bloom.
The contaminated coral shimmers in its multitudes. Countless fantastical lifeforms flit between them, using its glimmer to dispel the darkness of the depths. They grow. They form tides.
But Ulpianus ignores them. His gaze passes over a golden sea, over every scar, every inch of flesh, every cell, every chaotic waking dream...
It falls somewhere he cannot see. The deepest recess of his own self.
Ulpianus follows along.
